questions.question: As his children watched, the old man ......................... his eyes for the last time.
questions.description: We prefer close for slow movements.

questions.question: Her garments are made of the best ........................
questions.description: Cloth is the material used for making clothes. The nouns material and fabric can also be used instead of cloth.

questions.question: 'I suppose the movie wasn't very interesting.' '.............................., it was fantastic.'
questions.description: On the contrary is an expression used to contradict. On the other hand is used to give the other side of a question.

questions.question: The movie wasn't very interesting but ............................, its cinematography was superb.
questions.description: On the contrary is an expression used to contradict. On the other hand is used to give the other side of a question.

questions.question: We live in ..................... just outside California.
questions.description: The country is the opposite of the town.

questions.question: I am quite ......................... in politics.
questions.description: If you are uninterested in something, you have no interest in it.

questions.question: A banker should be able to give ......................... advice.
Have you .......................... doing the laundry yet?
questions.description: When finish is used with an object, it means complete.

questions.question: He ........................ his days in an old age home.
questions.description: To end days is to die.

questions.question: Our new apartment has a spare bedroom for ...................... visitors.
questions.description: The word eventual is not used to express the idea of possibility.

questions.question: The child didn't want to sleep but ........................ I got her to bed.
questions.description: Eventually is used to say that something happens after a long time or after a lot of effort.

questions.question: He has a very ......................... laugh.
questions.description: The word feminine is used to refer to qualities that are typical of women.
